q: for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google's CEO by co-founder Larry Page.

TUCSON, Ariz.-- Rep. Gabrielle Giffords is opening both eyes, moving both legs and arms and is responding to friends and family. Her doctors call it a`` major milestone'' in her recovery. We're hoping that she crosses through many more, said her neurosurgeon, Dr. Michael Lemole.
